org.apache.ambari.server.events

Class HostUpdateEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.events.STOMPEvent
      • org.apache.ambari.server.events.HostUpdateEvent

  • public class HostUpdateEvent
extends STOMPEvent
    Host info with updated parameter. This update will be sent to all subscribed recipients.
